channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report X-2024010691
item.description:
Report X-2024010691

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-06T18:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-17
  • City: HAMPTON
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The shipment was suspected to contain undeclared dg because of the UN Packaging it was shipped in. The shipper was contacted and provided the SDS that confirmed the shipment was UN 1202 Diesel Fuel. Inner contents: 2 glass bottles at approximately 1 Liter each, separately wrapped in cushioning/absorbent pads inside plastic barrier bags. There was no release of the contents. The shipment is being held for FAA investigation.
